title: Fizz about to be nerfed
body:
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/01/121-pbe-update.html


not sure what my thoughts are on this change.. tbh the only thing that pissed me off was his troll pole.

replies.body: so he still has similar burst, his troll poll is still broken as %%%%, yeah no. This is barely a nerf and has nothing to do with with what people actually hate, his cooldowns.
